A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I have been a Star Wars fan for 35 years and I was very excited to see this film. I enjoyed Rogue One and The Fire Awakens and thought the story was set up nicely for some wonderful plot lines and character building. I was left so disappointed! I have never rolled my eyes or shaken my head so much in a film. The story was weak\, the plot had so many holes in it\, the humour was misplaced and badly timed. It sucked.
